column1: #Text=Iroh says : " Zuko , remember that plant I thought might be tea ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " You did n't ... " Iroh says : " I did ... and it was n't . "
#Text=Iroh says : " When the rash spreads to my throat , I will stop breathing .
#Text=" Iroh says : " But where are we going to go ?
#Text=We 're enemies of the Earth Kingdom and fugitives from the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Zuko says : " If the Earth Kingdom discovers us , they 'll have us killed .
#Text=" Iroh says : " But if the Fire Nation discovers us , we 'll be turned over to Azula .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Earth Kingdom it is .
